summary: The document is a restricted government form related to the JFK assassination system, specifically an identification form for DOD-affiliated personnel incident investigations. It details a local agency check conducted on David Reed Fromer, a registrant with no records found in various sheriff's offices and police departments across California. The document was released with deletions on March 7, 1995, and includes agent notes and signatures.
key_findings: Document pertains to the JFK assassination system and DOD-affiliated personnel investigations.
Local agency checks on David Reed Fromer revealed no records in several California law enforcement agencies.
The document was originally restricted but was released with deletions in 1995.
Includes agent's notes and signatures, indicating it's part of an official investigation process.
